holidays.title: National Cat & Dog Gut Health Awareness Day
holidays.description: Almost every aspect of your cat’s or dog’s health depends on the complex community of microorganisms living in their gut. In all sorts of amazing ways, a healthy gut can help your pet live a longer, happier life.

holidays.title: Armenia Independence Day
holidays.description: Join the people of Armenia in mass parades and festivals as they celebrate their independence day.

holidays.title: Belize Independence Day
holidays.description: Feeling festive? This country's celebration has it all — music, food, friends, and fun.

holidays.title: Belize Independence Day
holidays.description: Crack open a rum punch and celebrate the anniversary of Belize’s independence.

holidays.title: Escapology Day
holidays.description: Check out three magical ways you too can enjoy Escapology Day like a professional.

holidays.title: Get Ready Day
holidays.description: Are you prepared for emergency crisis situations like natural disasters and pandemics?

holidays.title: International Day of Peace
holidays.description: Let there be peace by making the world a better and more sustainable place for all.

holidays.title: Mabon Day
holidays.description: Grab your fruit baskets and wine as we dedicate this festival to the bountiful harvest.

holidays.title: Malta Independence Day
holidays.description: Though one of the smallest nations globally, Malta has a rich political and cultural history.

holidays.title: Miniature Golf Day
holidays.description: Miniature golf can be traced back to the 19th century.

holidays.title: National Brittany Day
holidays.description: Celebrate anyone you know named Brittany and bring this name back in fashion!

holidays.title: National Chai Day
holidays.description: Ready your cups, water, and tea mix, as we celebrate an amazing herbal, nourishing drink.

holidays.title: National Garage Condo Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate National Garage Condo Day this September 21!

holidays.title: National Hannah Day
holidays.description: This holiday is your chance to honor and celebrate all your favorite Hannahs around the world!

holidays.title: National Kristina Day
holidays.description: Celebrate anyone you know with this name, with all its plentiful variations and spellings!

holidays.title: National Opioid Awareness Day
holidays.description: It’s National Opioid Awareness Day; all hands on deck to eliminate the abuse of these drugs.

holidays.title: National Pawpaw Day
holidays.description: It tastes like a cross between mango, banana, and sometimes other fruits.

holidays.title: National Pecan Cookie Day
holidays.description: Get your taste buds dancing as we dive into the cookie jar for National Pecan Cookie Day.

holidays.title: Telegraph Pole Appreciation Day
holidays.description: It’s time to ramp it up for a day dedicated to the appreciation for telegraph poles!

holidays.title: Wales International Film Festival
holidays.description: It is ‘on your marks, get set, go!’ As we join in the upcoming movie marathon.

holidays.title: World Alzheimer’s Day
holidays.description: On this day, the world concentrates its efforts on creating awareness of Alzheimer’s disease.

holidays.title: World Gratitude Day
holidays.description: World Gratitude Day is the day to start living a life of gratitude.

holidays.title: World Mini Golf Day
holidays.description: Come and join us as we learn more about this tee-rific holiday.

holidays.title: Bill Murray’s Birthday
holidays.description: A celebration of America's favorite actor is a civic duty for all of us.

holidays.title: Chen’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented musician has used his beautiful soulful voice to warm the hearts of many.

holidays.title: Elsy Guevara’s Birthday
holidays.description: This fashion influencer is hard-working and an inspiration to young women everywhere.

holidays.title: Faith Hill’s Birthday
holidays.description: This country music star is among the most well-known in the world.

holidays.title: Jason Derulo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Work hard, have faith, and never stop believing in yourself are his mantras.

holidays.title: Jena Frumes’s Birthday
holidays.description: This is just the beginning of success for this television and social media personality.

holidays.title: Liam Gallagher’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rock’s biggest god has been doing a great job at entertaining us throughout the years.

holidays.title: Megan Everett’s Birthday
holidays.description: This experienced Twitch streamer has been in the business for a long time.

holidays.title: Nicole Richie’s Birthday
holidays.description: What are some of the things she's accomplished? Who is she related to?

holidays.title: Shay Shariatzadeh’s Birthday
holidays.description: This engineer stays out of the spotlight, but she is a very supportive wife.

holidays.title: Stephen King’s Birthday
holidays.description: He published his first novel in 1974 and has since written over 50 books.
